dn23:2.6: vuddho → vudho (bj); buddho (sya-all, km, mr); vuḍḍho (pts1ed)
dn23:2.8: yena siṁsapāvanaṁ → yena sīsapāvanaṁ (sya-all, km); tenupasaṅkamanti (pts1ed)
dn23:3.7: arahā cā’ti → arahā ca (sya-all, km, mr)
dn23:7.7: rathikāya rathikaṁ → rathiyāya rathiyaṁ (bahūsu) | karitvā → kāretvā (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
dn23:9.2: Upamāya m’idhekacce → upamāyapi idhekacce (bj, pts1ed); upamāyapidhekacce (cck); upamāyapīdhekacce (cck, sya1ed, km)
dn23:9.11: subbaṭṭitaṁ ubbaṭṭethā’ti → ubbaṭitaṁ ubbaṭethāti (sya-all, km); suppaṭṭitaṁ uppaṭṭethāti (mr)
dn23:11.2: rattindivo → rattidivo (mr) | mānussakaṁ → mānusakaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn23:12.12: attānaṁ na mārenti → etthantare pāṭho sya-all, km, pts1ed potthakesu natthi
dn23:13.9: me → pitu me santako (sya-all, km) | niyyādehī’ti → niyyātehīti (bj); nīyyātehīti (pts1ed)
dn23:15.4: velāsikāpi → keḷāyikā pi (bj); celāvikāpi (sya-all, km); velāmikā (pts1ed)
dn23:21.4: sattho → satthavāso (sya-all, km) | janapade sattho → janapado satthavāso (sya-all, km); janapadapadeso (pts1ed)
dn23:21.30: opuni → opuṇi (bj); ophuni (sya-all, km, mr) | satadhā → vīsatidhā (sya-all, km)
dn23:23.69: saddhātabbaṁ → saddahātabbaṁ (bj, pts1ed, mr) | tava → te (mr)
dn23:27.16: gila pāpadhuttaka → gilare pāpadhuttā (sya-all, km); gili re pāpadhuttaka (mr)
dn23:32.2: dhorakāni → corakāni (sya-all, km); therakāni (pts1ed) | guḷavālakāni → guḷagāḷakāni (bj, mr)
dn23:32.16: pādāpi → pādāsi (mr) , samphusituṁ → phusituṁ (bj); chupituṁ (pts1ed, mr)
dn23:32.22: acittīkataṁ → apaviddhaṁ (bj); acittikataṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
dn23:35.6: pāyāsi dasamaṁ bhave → mahāvaggassa saṅgaho (bj, pts1ed); mahāvaggoti vuccatīti (sya-all, km)
